entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • X509Certificate2 Issuer is empty on Linux in netcoreapp3.1 #86679
  • JIT-EE interface clean up (tracking issue) #86672
    Future
  • Where should I reach out about publishing a new patch for System.Text.Encoding? #86671
  • Crossgen2 solution in the VS doesn't build in release mode complaining about missing ILCompiler.Diagnostics module #86670
    8.0.0
  • JIT: More elaborate store forwarding patterns with physical promotion #86665
    Future
  • System.Net.Http NuGet Package Missing README File #86667
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection NuGet Package Missing README File #86663
  • COM interface derivation chain for 3+ interfaces doesn't generate shadowing and vtables correctly #86662
    8.0.0
  • Missing NuGet package README file #86661
  • Wasm.Build.Tests timeouts while waiting for the web server #86658
    8.0.0
  • Configuration source generator broken when not supplying BinderOptions #86654
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator does not work unless Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions is referenced #86653
    8.0.0
  • Satellite assembly support in NativeAOT #86651
  • Trimming and extensions compatibility design – discussion #86649
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Deserialise object #86646
  • [browser][MT] Memory growth on worker could cause failure #86642
    8.0.0
  • `double.Parse` with `NumberStyles.Currency` Fails to Parse Strings with Non-Breaking Spaces #86641
  • Mono EventPipe code in ep_rt_temp_path_get has an off by 1 issue #86640
  • Find out exact ordering of hiragana/katakana letters in native apple platforms #86636
  • Trim analyzer doesn't see members on open generic type #86633
  • Make a pass over libraries wrt function pointers breaking change #86630
    8.0.0
  • Linq expression interpreter doesn't handle function pointers #86629
    8.0.0
  • MakeGenericXXX apis don't check for function pointers #86628
    8.0.0
  • Trim analyzer should defend against endless loops in analysis #86627
  • Trim analyzer handling of multi-value should not use HashSet #86626
  • [wasm] System.Memory tests failing with AOT running on V8 - `RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds` at `corlib_wrapper_delegate_invoke_System_Func_2_T_REF_TResult_REF_invoke_callvirt_TResult_T_T_REF ` #86621
    8.0.0
  • SerialPort is not supported on Android ? #86619
  • [7.0] WasmTestOnBrowser END OF WORK ITEM LOG: Command timed out, and was killed #86615
  • [Tracking] Decide if the tags order matter when creating meter or instrument #86614
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] CI failure in ios arm64 mono: The code signature version is no longer supported. Could not install the application. #86613

Closed

  • NativeAOT compile with FSharp get broken in net8.0.100-preview.4 #86676
  • Improve the Kerberos testing infrastructure #71453
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogReaderTests.CastToEventLogRecord_NotNull #78618
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.SourceDoesNotExist_Throws #78617
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce DI friendly IMeter<T> for modern services #77514
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json incremental source generator performance issues #68353
    8.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common gets pulled it all projects using System.Runtime.Caching #86488
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates cleanup stage for stateless marshalled parameters when it shouldn't #85795
  • Abberviated Month values for en-AU culture appear incorrect. #86643
  • Improve debugging experience of Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #86550
    Future
  • SslStress build fails on Windows #84800
    8.0.0
  • Code Cleanup: Remove OSX 10.14 compatibility code #60138
    Future
  • Upcoming OpenSSL change is likely going to cause failing unit tests #41021
    Future
  • Jiterpreter performance issues around Dictionary and GenericEqualityComparer #82948
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] Installer build failure: HostActivation Tests in coreclr windows_x86 & coreclr Linux_musl_x64 #86518
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for skipping visibility checks with AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicAssembly #85020
  • Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute on System.Type.GetEnumValues #86585
    8.0.0
  • [mono][linux][x64] crash in ep_buffer_manager_write_event #84257
  • https://github.com/Boxter187 #86623
  • CoreCLR breaks the ECMA spec (I.12.3.2.1) with ldsflda for custom types #62784
    Future
  • ChineseLunisolarCalendar gives wrong month #86620
  • [API Proposal] Make System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator constructor protected #86110
    8.0.0
  • Consider decomposing `GetElement(memory, ...)` into equivalent nodes #86345
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Print detailed comments for emitIns_R_AI in asm (targeting NativeAOT) #86677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump main version to Preview 6 #86675
    area-Infrastructure
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Use the BannedApiAnalyzer instead of the LinqPoison mechanism to ban Linq in the managed type system #86673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unify Roslyn testing SDK version across the repo #86669
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add newly introduced modifiers to our csharp_preferred_modifier_order editorconfig #86668
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement byval-out marshalling for unmanaged->managed #86666
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix crashing bug in StringDecoder.decode when accessing SharedArrayBuffer from different JavaScript realm #86664
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Adjust physical promotion heuristics #86660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use `u8` literals in `ManagedTextSection`. #86657
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Handle event pipe environment variable configuration and output to file on Windows #86656
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • add nuget.projectmodel to version.details #86650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a bug in type hierarchy marking in the trimmer #86635
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Pass SIMD type variables using SIMD registers #86634
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Follow related intervals for single-reg LIR temp intervals #86632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Don't pass uninitialized context to debugger #86625
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86617
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Move to new osx test queue for ios devices #86648
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Move to new osx test queue for ios devices #86647
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Metrics APIs Additions #86567
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Remove STJ dependency on IncrementalValuesProvider.Collect() #86616
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Remove DotNetCoreWeb from ProjectCapability #86639
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Avoid calling Encoding.GetBytes when Vector128 is not hardware accelerated #85267
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix possible stack overflow in TotalOrderIeee754Comparer #86593
    area-System.Numerics
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration debugging #86624
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: Use unsigned native return types for small structs #86631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assert failure in grow_heap_segment in no GC region. #86644
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [6.0-staging] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86576
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute message #86602
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][AOT] Enabled tests which fail to JIT compile during AOT #86581
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Turn webcil off for .NET < 8.0 #86505
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Unreachable filter end #86492
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix endless loop in illink analyzer #86449
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add note about transient pointers to ECMA augments #86622
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Abstract out System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator #86594
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] No longer discard jiterp inference information when crossing a branch #86611
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [6.0] Remove centos 8 images #86478
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Remove centos 8 images #86477
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Missing version number bump #86599
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Guarded devirtualization: multiple type checks #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2187003 #86535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use cinv and cneg instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add get AppContext properties diagnostic IPC command #86610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser] threads cleanup #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [ios][wasm] Bump to ICU-72 #84849
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on iOS #86583
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [NativeAOT] Cache some allocations when invoking Linq.Expression lambdas. #86607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
